pages.title: Kamen Rider Meikoku no Sanshimai
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Three Dark Sisters Presents: Kamen Rider Gotchard Unfinished Plan (2024, audio drama)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/devices/dreadriver#dreadriver_meikoku_no_sanshimai)Dreadriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Jump Boost$(li)Strength II
